## R Markdown

set up the reference distribution
```{r}
n <- 1e5
ref_dist_sample <- rnorm(n)

```

```{r}
f <- function(x){
  exp(-1/2*x^2)/sqrt(2*pi)
}
```

```{r}
x <- 1
f(x)
dnorm(x)
exp(-1/2)/sqrt(2*pi)
```
```{r}
# true value 0.282095
x <- rnorm(n)
f_list <- f(x)
(sample_mean_f <- mean(f_list))
```
